name: arbeitsfrei
longText: Filmed in Berlin on 16mm. It was awarded Best International Shortfilm at the CGIFF Film Festival in Vancouver, Washington. Arbeitsfrei(workfree) was shot in Berlin it takes an other look at unemployment

name: Oktober in the Chair
longText: Title Sequence for a short film, based on a poem with the same title.

name: MissCommunication

name: KIRS Rowing
longText: KIRS - Kiwi International Rowing Skiffs Ltd Promotional Video

name: African Odyssey
longText: A documentary following four friends hailing from Whakatane - New Zealand. Going from Cape Town to London, these Kiwi lads take on Africa with their motorbikes. Armed with limited motorcycle experience, funds or planning and plenty of enthusiasm Phillip Anderson, Jeremy Gray, Julian Kardos and Nic Twaddle set out to ride motorbikes from Cape Town to London.
